mainEntityOfPage.name: Reliance Standalone December 2023 Net Sales at Rs 127,695.00 crore, up 1.36% Y-o-Y

headline: Reliance Standalone December 2023 Net Sales at Rs 127,695.00 crore, up 1.36% Y-o-Y
keywords: Earnings First-Cut, Refineries, Reliance, Reliance Industries, Results
articleBody: Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Reliance Industries are:Net Sales at Rs 127,695.00 crore in December 2023 up 1.36% from Rs. 125,987.00 crore in December 2022.Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 9,924.00 crore in December 2023 up 18.52% from Rs. 8,373.00 crore in December 2022.EBITDA stands  at Rs.  20,527.00 crore in December 2023 up 16.54% from Rs. 17,613.00 crore in December 2022.Reliance EPS has increased to Rs. 14.67 in December 2023 from Rs. 12.38 in December 2022.Reliance shares closed at 2,734.90 on January 19, 2024 (NSE) and has given -3.03% returns over the last 6 months and 10.51% over the last 12 months.Reliance IndustriesStandalone Quarterly Resultsin Rs.
